reviews.review: Very good game, think the prime upgrade is worth the money if you want to play this game more. Countless hours of sweat tears and fun.

A Fantastic challenging action game that makes your heart and adrenaline pumping like crazy, but a lot of cheaters is from time to time spoiling the game experience. 
Still though I love this game, the cool and beautiful skins, the excitement, thrill and action, and obvious all the friendly and funny people you can talk to and be friends with all over the world :)
